channel.title: New coder- comment (first server, basics)
channel.description:
i have decided to show my very first server. i am a new coder as i wanted a change from just playing servers after i quit rs.
i have not finished the server as i am needing help on a couple of things but i will figure it out or ask for help :D
a little info i have changed:
- new pk area's. - different items, shops. - less commands, changed few, added. - very different to the base i used. - alot more.
here are some pictures.
home: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2w6bev5.jpg[/img]
::commands. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/394t2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2cyo5uh.jpg[/img]
::modinfo. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/mtqxd1.jpg[/img]
teampk. [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/10rmlxj.jpg[/img]
pk-points shop. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/qz3hhy.jpg[/img]
things im working on:
- a couple more commands. - make items not spawnable. - change mod/admin zone. - wildy lvls and barrage.
i have started coding one of these sorts of servers (pking based) because im still learning the basics but i am going past the basics.
~~credits~~
80% me 10% tuts 20% the source i started with - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,334883.0.html
after what i want to edit and add, i will code more for the server to make it better.

item.title: New coder- comment (first server, basics)
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:6, topic:259012”]This as all been seen before!

The economy and gameplay is horrid!
You all letting normal people use ::master and ::pickup[/quote]

dude?

  1. why would i put this server up when its only a start off server??
  2. master is the same as ::pure and lots of servers have ::pure so dont complain.
  3. if people have pickup rights then there will be on economy dumbo.

Read full topic

item.title: New coder- comment (first server, basics)
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

well, i decided to make a server like this because i used to play a server just like this with many people and it was fun and since im not experienced in java alot just yet, i thought something like this will make me keep and remeber the basics. after i have finished with this one, i will make alot better one.

i just thought as my first server i should make it easy server to start if your new to java.

thanks, for the comments so far

Read full topic

item.title: New coder- comment (first server, basics)
item.dc:creator: @_Co.NR ~Co.NR~
item.description:
@_Co.NR wrote:

yeah i would suggest u take out all commands that make the game boring, like ::master or ::xrichie for atleast normal players, but if mods or admins+ could do it, it would be good
~Gl,
xBRxBeastX

Read full topic

item.title: New coder- comment (first server, basics)
item.dc:creator: @waiter_8 waiter_8
item.description:
@waiter_8 wrote:

I would suggest you take out the command ::M, or easy commands like that. It’s not good for a stable community, because players would have all the money they would like. If your just looking for a fun server, have lots of commands and easier training. But if you want a stable source, just use common commands such as ::suggest, ::yell, ::mypos, etc. Just thought that might help since your new to the experience. Anyways good luck!

Read full topic
